name: Knight survivor
description:
A game about GROWING... weapons. For the KenneyGame jam.

Vampire survivor clone. Gamepad comatible.

Move:     W,A,S,D - Arrow Keys - Left Stick

Interact:  Space - South Button

To reduce lag play with google chrome and close any other tab except this one.

Post you hight score in the comments.

For the KenneyGame jam.
